abilities.name: Perfect Balance
abilities.description: Costs 1 less for each different element among units you control

abilities.name: Harmonious Blend
abilities.description: When played, heal all friendly units for 2 and give them +1/+1

body.raw:
# Temperance

The divine alchemist blends opposing forces into perfect harmony, creating something greater than the sum of its parts.

*"In moderation lies the path to transcendence."*

Temperance represents balance, moderation, and purpose. She rewards diverse deck building and provides healing support.
